abstract: Los Angeles jury convicts Dr Hsiu-Ying Tseng of second-degree murder in deaths of three patients who overdosed on painkillers she prescribed.
lead_paragraph: A Los Angeles jury convicted a physician of second-degree murder in the deaths of three patients who overdosed on painkillers she prescribed.

headline.main: California: Doctor Is Convicted in Overdose Deaths of Patients
headline.print_headline: California: Doctor Is Convicted in Overdose Deaths of Patients

snippet: A Los Angeles jury convicted a physician of second-degree murder in the deaths of three patients who overdosed on painkillers she prescribed.
